text: I've been procrastinating on starting my project for three days.
I feel overwhelmed with too many tasks and don't know where to begin.
I'm doubting if I'm good enough to finish this successfully.
I keep getting distracted by social media instead of working.
I'm exhausted and want to give up on my goals.
I made a mistake and now I feel like a failure.
I'm scared to start because what if I fail?
I haven't been productive all week and feel guilty.
Everyone else seems to be doing better than me.
I don't feel motivated to work on this anymore.
I'm stuck and can't figure out how to move forward.
I have a deadline tomorrow and haven't started yet.
I keep making the same mistakes over and over.
I feel like quitting but I know I shouldn't.
I'm too tired to focus on anything important today.
I set goals but never follow through on them.
I'm afraid people will judge me if I try and fail.
I wasted the whole day and accomplished nothing.
I don't think I have what it takes to succeed.
I keep saying I'll start tomorrow but never do.
